00003 /**
00004  * Contains all interaction related to forums.
00005  *
00006  * @author Ryan LeFevre
00007  */
00008 class OsimoForum {
00009  
00010  /**
00011   * Class constructor.
00012   *
00013   * @param Array $info
00014   *  All of the data pertaining to a particular forum.
00015   */
00016  function OsimoForum($info) {
00017   if (is_array($info)) {
00018    foreach ($info as $key=>$val) {
00019     $this->$key = $val;
00020    }
00021 
00022    $this->format_dates();
00023   }
00024  }
00025 
00026  private function format_dates() {
00027   $this->last_post_time = get('user')->date_format($this->last_post_time, true);
00028  }
00029 
00030  /**
00031   * Retrieves a single piece of information about the
00032   * currently loaded forum.
00033   *
00034   * @param String $field
00035   * @return The data specified by $field.
00036   */
00037  public function get($field) {
00038   if ($field == 'last_thread_link') {
00039    return $this->forum_last_thread_link();
00040   }
00041   elseif (isset($this->$field)) {
00042    return $this->$field;
00043   }
00044 
00045   return false;
00046  }
00047 
00048  /**
00049   * Formats a link to the last updated thread in this forum.
00050   *
00051   * @return A link to a thread
00052   */
00053  public function forum_last_thread_link() {
00054   return SITE_URL.'thread.php?id='.$this->the_forum['last_thread_id'];
00055  }
00056 }
